QuestData.Title: Clipping Their Wings
QuestData.Description: Ever since Finklestein's arrival, I've been relegated to collecting various ingredients for his experiments and recipes.$b$bI'll follow my orders as I've vowed to do, but I'm a seasoned veteran. I've taken part in dozens of conflicts. I'd much rather be on the front lines, having a more direct impact on the Crusade's outcome here.$b$bHelp me, $r. Collect some bat wings for me so that I might get back to the real action sooner.
QuestData.LogDescription: Captain Arnath in Heb'Valok has asked you to collect 7 Unblemished Bat Wings from Zul'Drak Bats.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you finished collecting those bat wings for Finklestein?
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent work, $n.$b$bI thank you for your assistance.
